content:
Ever since Compania rose and the tide ebbed,
We've been finding new friends every day
Among the rocky shores of our beach~

From now on...
We'll share the bright sun in clear skies,
And dance with the moon in starlit nights.

With you all by my side,
The <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color> is never a lonely journey.

The two boldest things I've ever done:
Joining the Astralink Initiative,
And my wonderful journey with Compania~

They are...
memories that I'll always cherish.

I've heard that seashells are the most dedicated sound recorders,
capable of delivering thoughts from a thousand miles away
without losing a single note~

I wonder...
For whom are the seashells we found on the beach running errands now?

Hey,
do you think crabs and lobsters play together in the sand?
